# behavior

**Instance Property**

The standard behavior type of the split view item.

## Declaration

```swift
var behavior: NSSplitViewItem.Behavior { get }
```

## Getting the item behavior

- **NSSplitViewItem.Behavior**: Constants that describe the behavior of the split view item.
